text.jpText: それでは本年度の『桜花賞』ウイニングライブ！！\nお聞きください『彩 Phantasia』！
text.enText:
And now, this year's 『Oka Sho』 Winning Live!! 
Please listen to 『Colorful Phantasia』!

text.jpText: step by step 積み重ね
text.enText: step by step it just keeps growing
This future I'm weaving with you

text.jpText: one by one 乗り越えて
by and by 手繰り寄せた
text.enText: by and by our hands came together

text.jpText: たった一度の[舞台]<ステージ>
text.enText: Just once, together on this stage

text.jpText: 舞い散る花びらを従えて
text.enText: As we follow the fluttering petals all around
So let's spread our wings and fly

text.jpText: 時空飛んで 次元も超えて
text.enText: Crossing through time and space, through dimensions
A scent comes falling from the sky above

text.jpText: 神さま 惑わせたい
このまま 離さない ゆずれない 渡さない
text.enText: And just like this I won't let go, I won't give up, won't let it go

text.jpText: もう大丈夫。わたしはいける。未来へ――
text.enText: I'll be fine now. I can do it. In to the future――

text.jpText: たくさんの幸せを[掴]<つか>んで、残すんだ
text.enText: I'll take hold of lots of happiness, and leave it behind
